dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: Stratum Type
dataModel.author: J. Harris
dataModel.description: This table stores information about the types of strata included in the plot collection process.

entity.entitySummary: This table stores data about the types of strata included in a plot. It is anticipated that authors will apply different meanings to the common strata types and this entity will allow the database user to determine exactly what the plot author meant by each stratum included in his/her plot. Moreover, if the author chooses to use a formerly unused name he/she will be able to define the stratum in this table.

attribute.attDefinition: Primary Key for the stratumType table.

This is the name of the stratum. Notice that the structure of this table allows for multiple meanings to be applied to a specific stratum name but that each plot will be linked to a unique name/meaning pair.
This column stores a text string describing what is meant by the stratum name.
